column2: And I could hear that there were fewer people in the little station when the train wasn't there, so I opened my eyes and I looked at my watch and it said 8:07 p.m. and I had been sitting on the bench for approximately 5 hours but it hadn't seemed like approximately 5 hours, except that my bottom hurt and I was hungry and thirsty.
column3: The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time

column2: Bennie pulled the transcripts for that night. The first call had come in at 8:07, with a positive ID.
